Html:
I have some code that seems to execute fine up until this point:
excelApp.Run(myProps.Macro);
It creates the excel instance fine, and open the correct file path, but when it attempts to execute the macro, I continue to get a Error:
An unhandled exception of type 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException' occurred in NetOffice.dll
Also, I have the most recent release of NetOffice, and I found there did not appear to be a need to use:
LateBindingApi.Core.Initialize()
Is there a replacement for this, or is it automatically used?
